description: From Latin. By surface analysis, cone +‎ -i- (“bearing”) +‎ -ferous, or conifer +‎ -ous (“pertaining to”), as reflected in the meanings.

adjectives.description: coniferous (comparative more coniferous, superlative most coniferous)

entries.meaning: Bearing cones, as the pine and cypress.
Of, or pertaining to, a conifer.
